short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically send bulk Facebook friend requests. one click to withdraw pending friend requests

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
MUST READ
1. Make sure you have login to facebook.com.
2. Make sure to use a User account, not a Page account. You can switch the User account by clicking your FB Account Menu.

FEATURES
- Auto Send friend requests from your user account.
- Auto withdraw pending friend requests

PRIVACY
All data is processed locally on your computer, never passing through our web server, ensuring the privacy of your data.
